alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 05 at 7:14PM PST until January 07 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING ALONG THE BASE OF THE OREGON BLUE MOUNTAINS... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible along the base of the Blue Mountains east of Pendleton. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Interstate 84 from Mission to Cabbage Hill will be affected by the strong winds. Strong crosswinds are likely along Highway 11 from Pendleton to Milton-Freewater.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
